title: Baked aubergine with cheese in tomato sauce
ingredients: ['2 aubergines, medium-sized', 'olive oil', '3 cloves of garlic', '1 onion', '500ml tomato pasta sauce', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 teaspoon dried basil', 'salt and pepper to taste', '250g shredded mozzarella cheese', '60g grated Parmesan sheese', 'fresh parsley for garnishing']
